subject: Drug Abuse and Traffic
Olympic Games (2008)
International Trade and World Market
Steroids
Human Growth Hormone
lead_paragraph: The announcement that China had punished companies linked to performance-enhancing drugs was heralded as evidence that it was determined to host a clean Olympics.
snippet: The announcement that China had punished companies linked to performance-enhancing drugs was heralded as evidence that it was determined to host a clean Olympics.
